job.title: Software Engineer (TS/SCI with Full Scope Poly Required)
job.description: If you are a Software Engineer with an active, TS/SCI Clearance and a Full Scope Poly, please read on!  We're a government contractor based in Maryland that is currently supporting a client who needs a Software Engineer in Annapolis Junction, MD.  This person must have an active, TS/SCI Clearance with a Full Scope Poly and be comfortable working on-site.  What's In It for You What You Will Be Doing What You Need for this Position So, if you are a Software Engineer with an active, TS/SCI Clearance and a Full Scope Poly, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Daniel.Chavez@CyberCoders.com Daniel Chavez - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.  CyberCoders will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring (Ban the Box) Ordinance.
